means: 效用，利益( avail的名词复数 )
有用于，有益于，有助于( avail的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_cn: 没有仁爱的美丽毫无用处.

sentence.Network_en: The petition of a righteous man avails much in its working.
sentence.Network_cn: 义人的祈求发动起来,是大有能力的.

sentence.Network_en: It avails to realize high and superhigh yield of spring wheat.
sentence.Network_cn: 从而提出“三优”栽培法——优区、优种、优措施,有利实现春小麦高产和超高产.

list.abs: 物理学英语专业词汇表 ... 永久气体 Permanent gas 有效能 available energy 原电池 primary cell.
availability - 英汉词典 ... product availability 产品的可获得性供给预测 availability forecast availability 可用性.
sap专业词汇 - 豆丁网 ... D Date Adjust-- 调整日期 Date Available-- 有效日期 Date Changed-- 修改日期.
我秀我自己，有什么不可以 - 日记 ... 可用场强 usable field strength 可用时间 available time 可用性 availability.

entry.def: If you do something to no avail or to little avail, what you do fails to achieve what you want.

example.ex: His efforts were to no avail...
I apologized repeatedly, but to little avail.
example.tran: 我一再道歉，但丝毫没有奏效。

entry.def: If you avail yourself of an offer or an opportunity, you accept the offer or make use of the opportunity.

example.ex: Guests should feel at liberty to avail themselves of your facilities.
example.tran: 宾客们应该可以随意使用你们的各种设施。

auth_sentence.content: He has taken questions at different press avails from a whole host of reporters.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has taken questions at different press avails from a whole host of reporters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has taken questions at different press avails from a whole host of reporters.

auth_sentence.content: How little, we feel, avails knowledge and technical cleverness against a man who truly feels!
auth_sentence.res_content: How little, we feel, avails knowledge and technical cleverness against a man who truly feels!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How little, we feel, avails knowledge and technical cleverness against a man who truly feels!

auth_sentence.content: It gets more exotic from there, as Chesapeake avails itself of innovative financial tools on a massive scale.
auth_sentence.res_content: It gets more exotic from there, as Chesapeake avails itself of innovative financial tools on a massive scale.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It gets more exotic from there, as Chesapeake avails itself of innovative financial tools on a massive scale.
